alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 2:44PM MDT until April 05 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO 9 AM MDT TUESDAY FOR ELEVATIONS ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected for elevations above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph at times. * WHERE...Beaverhead County. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to 9 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will occur Monday afternoon and evening, when moderate to heavy snow showers accompany a passing cold front.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
